text: The 1987 UCI Track Cycling World Championships were the World Championship for track cycling. They took place in Vienna, Austria in August 1987.World Championship Track Cycling 2014–1893 Fourteen events were contested, 12 for men (5 for professionals, 7 for amateurs) and 2 for women. ==Medal summary== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's professional events |- |Men's keirin |Harumi Honda || Claudio Golinelli || Urs Freuler |- |Men's sprint |Nobuyuki Tawara || Hideyuki Matsui || Claudio Golinelli |- | |Hans-Henrik Ørsted || Jesper Worre || Tony Doyle |- |Men's points race |Urs Freuler || Tony Doyle || Roger Ilegems |- |Men's motor-paced |Max Hürzeler || Danny Clark || Werner Betz |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's amateur events |- | | Martin Vinnicombe || Jens Glücklich || Konstantin Khrabtsov |- |Men's sprint |Lutz Hesslich || Bill Huck || Michael Hübner |- | |Gintautas Umaras || Viatcheslav Ekimov || Artūras Kasputis |- |Men's team pursuit | Viatcheslav Ekimov Alexander Krasnov Viktor Manakov Sergeï Chmelinine || Steffen Blochwitz Dirk Meier Carsten Wolf Roland Hennig || Pavel Soukup Miroslav Kundera Svatopluk Buchta Miroslav Junec |- |Men's points race |Marat Ganeev || Uwe Messerschmidt || Pascal Lino |- |Men's motor-paced |Mario Gentili || Vincenzo Colamartino || Roland Königshofer |- |Men's tandem | Fabrice Colas Frédéric Magné || Andrea Faccini Roberto Nicotti || Vítězslav Vobořil Lubomír Hargaš |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Women's events |- |Women's sprint |Erika Salumäe |Christa Rothenburger |Connie Paraskevin-Young |- |Women's individual pursuit |Rebecca Twigg |Jeannie Longo |Mindee Mayfield |} ==Medal table== ==See also== * 1987 UCI Road World Championships ==References== Uci Track Cycling World Championships, 1987 Track cycling Category:UCI Track Cycling World Championships by year Category:International cycle races hosted by Austria
title: 1987 UCI Track Cycling World Championships
